item.title: Barriers Remain to the Use of Polypills for CVD Therapy
item.description: Multi-medicine pills are ‘saving lives,’ but financial and regulatory challenges remain in US and UK. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Food Safety Crisis Looms in Pediatric Population
item.description: CAERS reports reveal a 15.5-fold increase in serious adverse food- and supplement-related events in youth since 2004. Medscape Medical News
